MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH11 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Newton Street and surrounding streets. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2.40PM due to safe repairs required to our underground cable network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 6.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 2.17PM on 28 November 2020.
